solution_line_template: There are {num_blue_balls} blue x {red_multiplier} red/blue = <<{num_blue_balls}*{red_multiplier}={num_red_balls}>>{num_red_balls} red balls.
The total number of blue and red balls is {num_blue_balls} blue + {num_red_balls} red = <<{num_blue_balls}+{num_red_balls}={total_red_blue_balls}>>{total_red_blue_balls} balls
There are {total_balls} balls - {total_red_blue_balls} balls = <<{total_balls}-{total_red_blue_balls}={num_green_balls}>>{num_green_balls} green balls.
